verses.content: Juda lalhai Uzzia, Jotham, Ahaz le Hezekia inlal lai le Israel lal Jeroboam, Joas naupa inlal laia Beeri naupa Hosea kuoma LALPA thu hung tlung chu.
Hosea hmanga LALPA thu hril phutna chu. LALPA chun Hosea kuomah, “Fe la, nawchizawr thla, nawchizawr mi, nuhmeiah va nei rawh, hi ram hin LALPA chu a uiret hmangsan tah,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, a feh a, Diblaim naunu Gomer chu a nei tah a; chun, nau a vawn a, naupasal a neipêk a.
Chun, LALPA chun a kuomah, “A hmingah Jezreel sak rawh; Jezreel thisen phuba chu Jehu sûnghai chungah lâng ka ta; Israel sûnghai ram chu suktâwp ka tih.
Chun, chu nia chun Jezreel ruomah Israelhai thalngul chu suktliek ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, nau a vawn nâwk a, naunuhmei a nei a. Chun, a kuomah, “A hmingah Lo-ruhama sak rawh; Israel sûnghai chu ka lainat ngai ta naw ding a nih, ka ngaidam vak ta âwm si nawh a.
Juda sûnghai ruok chu lainat ka ta, thalngul amanih, kâwlhnâm amanih, indona amanih, sakawr amanih, sakawr chung chuong mi amaniha anni sandam loin, LALPA an Pathien chun sandam ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Lo-ruhama chu nêne nêk ân bântir a, chun, nau a vawn nâwk a, naupasal a nei a.
Chun, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih a, “A hmingah Lo-ammi sak rawh, nangni hi ka mihai in ni si nawh a; chun, kei khawm in Pathien ni naw ning,” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, Israel nauhai chu tuisuorieta phaiphin, inkhi ruol lo le tiem ruol lo zât nîng an ta; chun, an kuomah, “Ka mihai in ni nawh” tina hmun ngeia chun “Pathien hring nauhai in nih,” ti nîng a tih.
Chun, Juda nauhai le Israel nauhai chu pung khâwm an ta, an lu ding ruot an ta, chu rama inthawk chun hang fêng an ta, Jezreel ni chu a ropui ding a ni sih a.
